solution_line_template: Peter has to walk a remaining {total_miles_to_walk} total miles - {miles_already_walked} mile completed = <<{total_miles_to_walk}-{miles_already_walked}={remaining_miles}>>{remaining_miles} miles remaining
It will take him another {minutes_per_mile} minutes * {remaining_miles} miles remaining = <<{minutes_per_mile}*{remaining_miles}={time_remaining}>>{time_remaining} minutes to get to the grocery store
